journey.name: Diving into Tech
journey.altText: A laptop with calender and coffee
journey.description: Why and how I found my way into Tech and what it has really meant.

journey.name: Building DailyHealth
journey.altText: A computer, a yoga mat and a plant on the floor.
journey.description: A small personal app for mindful routines with a sprinkle of AI.

journey.name: Can you love code?
journey.altText: A table with a cup of tea and a woman writing notes.
journey.description: Sometimes I wonder — does coding have to be your whole life to count as a passion?

journey.name: Career Week just kicked off at Technigo
journey.altText: Celebration scene with confetti and a ballon
journey.description: Two full weeks of React ahead.

journey.name: Freelance project - Wordpress
journey.altText: A desk with a laptop, pens, a cup of coffee and a calendar.
journey.description: Lessons from a real-world WordPress project — SEO, accessibility & performance.

journey.name: Accessibility - 4 fixes
journey.altText: A group working on accessibility with computers and coffee with snacks.

journey.name: Bootcamp coming to an end
journey.altText: A black background with white text saying the journey is on.

journey.name: Remote - what it takes to show up online
journey.altText: A desk with at laptop live on zoom with a cup of coffee
journey.description: Reflections and thoughts around working remotley.

journey.name: Tips and Tricks on accessibility for entrepreneurs
journey.altText: A laptop with a pink notebook that says goals.
journey.description: Tips and tricks on accessibility for entrepreneurs.

journey.name: Freelance project - Squarespace
journey.altText: A laptop with code on the screen and books on the side of the laptop.
journey.description: Accessibility and SEO on a Squarespace webpage.

journey.name: Building with AI - Lovable
journey.description: Building with AI to understand how it works in practice, where AI can help and where it might fall short.
